ygData.subject: Crawl sequence option/ modification in Heritrix3
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Noah Levitt, I want to configure Heritrix for crawl sequence/ order with Ascending, Descending or Random. I went through most of the settings in cxml config

Hi Noah Levitt,

I want to configure Heritrix for crawl sequence/ order wit=
h Ascending, Descending or Random.
I went through most of the settings in c=
xml config file but was not able to find the same.

Can you please tell me =
how can I provide option to Heritrix, so that it can set the crawl sequence=
 of queue that it maintains?

Thanks in advance.
